name: Math Rock
description:
Math Rock is a prototype educational game made for Clear Pictures. It mainly covers arithmetic operations and aims to improve the speed an accuracy of the player by challenging them through good and satisfying gameplay.

The game consists of three levels: One for addition, subtraction, and multiplication. Each level has slightly different starting lives count and note movement and generation speeds to add some variety to each level.

The game also contains five types of notes: Normal, bonus, double points, explosive, and time slow. The better you play, the more special notes will be generated.

Made by Tarek Yasser and  Abdulrahman Elhosseini
